text: Hirasawa (written: 平澤 or 平沢) is a Japanese surname. Notable people with the surname include: *, Japanese alpine skier *, Japanese politician *Maia Hirasawa (born 1980), Swedish singer-songwriter *, Japanese astronomer *, Japanese professional wrestler *, Japanese pornographic actress *, Japanese tempera painter *, Japanese footballer *, Japanese progressive-electronic musician and composer ==Fictional characters== *, character in the anime series Higashi no Eden *, character in the manga series K-On! *, character in the manga series K-On!
